    PSA: If you are ever in the Bend, OR, area I suggest you check out Spork. Last night I had the Maui Z cocktail (delish); pepper-infused vodka, rum, fresh lime, cilantro, mint and pineapple juice followed by the chilaquiles with carnitas (heavenly).
